```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)

map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress08.nj.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}
map_id %>%
  get_county_map_data() %>%
  map_counties(height = "700px", congress = 8)
```

</div>

New Jersey elected six Democratic-Republicans to the Eighth Congress.

New Jersey switched back to an at-large system for electing members to Congress. New Jersey was apportioned one more seat in the House of Representatives.

<div class="results-table">

```{r election-results, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
map_id %>%
  candidate_results() %>%
  results_to_table(keep_percentage = 0.01) %>%
  cat()
```

</div>
